actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to amend the House rules to require that the report of each House committee on each public bill or joint resolution reported by the committee shall contain a statement as to the inflationary impact on the national economy of the enactment of such legislation.

summary.text: Requires each report of a committee of the House of Representatives on each bill or joint resolution of a public character reported by such committee to contain a detailed analytical statement as to whether the enactment of such bill or joint resolution into law may have an inflationary impact on prices and costs in the operation of the national economy.

titles.title: Resolution to amend the House rules to require that the report of each House committee on each public bill or joint resolution reported by the committee shall contain a statement as to the inflationary impact on the national economy of the enactment of such legislation.
